sentence.Network_en: The new aesthetic forms were thenceforward written off as typical aberrations of late capitalism society.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些新的美学形式从此被当作资本主义社会后期典型的离经叛道而被一笔勾销了.

sentence.Network_en: Thenceforward he held up each note in its turn and waited.
sentence.Network_cn: 此后他只须依次把字条拿在手里等着.

sentence.Network_en: From thenceforward that bargain struck in child's play made me a free man.
sentence.Network_cn: 从那时起,在孩子的游戏中我们做成了交易,这使我变成一个自由的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The Black Cat (1) ... conflagration 大火；火灾 thenceforward 从那时, 其后 atrocity 暴行.

list.abs: it starts for no reason and for this reason nothing can stop it thenceforward .它开始得没有原因，也因此没有什么可以它停下。
